chart.name: cumulated.hours.year.chart
chart.title: Cumulated hours on year
chart.dataset: SELECT departure_date AS day, SUM(actual_duration) OVER (PARTITION BY to_char(departure_date, 'YYYY') ORDER BY departure_date) / 3600.0 AS hours FROM flight_actual_duty WHERE duty IN (SELECT id FROM flight_duty WHERE is_leave = 'f') AND date_part('year', departure_date) = date_part('year', CURRENT_DATE)

chart.name: cumulated.hours.last.period.charts
chart.title: Cumulated hours on period
chart.dataset: SELECT fad1.departure_date AS day, t.hours FROM flight_actual_duty as fad1 INNER JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT sum(actual_duration) / 3600.0 as hours FROM flight_actual_duty as fad2 WHERE fad2.departure_date BETWEEN (fad1.departure_date - INTERVAL '28 DAY') AND fad1.departure_date ) as t ON 1=1 WHERE duty IN (SELECT id FROM flight_duty WHERE is_leave = 'f') ORDER BY day
